short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool which enables the user to automatically logIn into different e-commerce websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool which enables the user to automatically log into different e-commerce websites, without having to manually type in the ID/PW fields and clicking the login button.
